attributes.action: Make black market racketeering a criminal offence during Covid19 Emergency
attributes.additional_details: Basically the COVID19 Pandemic is placing the UK in what is equivalent to a war footing. The racketeering of blackmarketeers needs to be addressed in the same way it was during the last two World Wars.
attributes.background: Government to pass emergency legislation to make it illegal for individuals to stockpile necessary medical related supplies with the intent of profiting from sales on for example E-bay or Amazon during the present COVID19 Pandemic.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303070

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
